posts.post_title: Low Grade T206 HOFers For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason Silvey
I have a few T206 HOFers up for sale. If it doesn't have a price, I'll take offers. Prices are shipped and I'll insure anything over $100. Paypal add 3%. Emails take priority. Thanks.

<a href="http://s225.photobucket.com/albums/dd109/mjsilvey80/" target="_new" rel="nofollow">[url]http://s225.photobucket.com/albums/dd109/mjsilvey80/</a[/url]>

Jason
